title: Doodlebugs
overview: Doodlebugs is a series in which clip show meets sketch show and draws a funny face on it.Doodlebugs gives a voice to all that stuff in the world that doesn't have a voice - because it can't actually talk. Washing machines, wheelie bins, mobility scooters and suitcases at long last get a chance to air their views and opinions through voices from the comedy world.
